importCallExpressionShouldNotGetParen.ts(2,1): error TS2711: A dynamic import call returns a 'Promise'. Make sure you have a declaration for 'Promise' or include 'ES2015' in your '--lib' option.
importCallExpressionShouldNotGetParen.ts(2,43): error TS7006: Parameter 'bar' implicitly has an 'any' type.

importCallExpressionShouldNotGetParen.ts(6,48): error TS7006: Parameter 'bar' implicitly has an 'any' type.

==== importCallExpressionShouldNotGetParen.ts (4 errors) ====
    const localeName = "zh-CN";
    import(`./locales/${localeName}.js`).then(bar => {
    ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
!!! error TS2711: A dynamic import call returns a 'Promise'. Make sure you have a declaration for 'Promise' or include 'ES2015' in your '--lib' option.
                                              ~~~
!!! error TS7006: Parameter 'bar' implicitly has an 'any' type.
        let x = bar;
    });
    
    import("./locales/" + localeName + ".js").then(bar => {
    ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
!!! error TS2711: A dynamic import call returns a 'Promise'. Make sure you have a declaration for 'Promise' or include 'ES2015' in your '--lib' option.
                                                   ~~~
!!! error TS7006: Parameter 'bar' implicitly has an 'any' type.
        let x = bar;
    });
